metadata.synopsis: Roland and Umi are standing at the bar. Umi is behind the bar and Roland is badgering Umi to serve him more alcohol. Roland is extremely drunk and belligerent, and Umi is trying to calm him down.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Roland and Umi at the bar in Haven. Tieflings must have been saved from the goblins in act 1 and Rolan convinced to help them.
